video.title: Paparazzi footage of Kelly Rutherford with husband and baby son in New York City
video.description: Actress Kelly Rutherford seen out and about in NYC with her husband, german businessman Daniel Giersch, and their 2-year-old son, Herm?s. The adorable family attended the '10th Annual Key To The Cure Charity Shopping Weekend' at Top of the Rock in Rockefeller Center. The couple stopped with their baby son to pose for photographers, kissed each other, and Kelly also kissed the babies head, just before heading off. Two strangers on the street who are sitting in the back of a bicycle taxi then offer them a ride, but they politely refuse.
